files.name: 1885-1897 Complete Transcripts.txt
files.content:
Letter from Julia Martin dated 1885_1-1: My dearest Alice, I hope this letter finds you well. We had the most wonderful time at the party last evening. The weather has been quite agreeable. Mother sends her regards and hopes you will visit us soon. Your devoted friend, Julia Martin.
